response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, it is worth $1,000,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible deal while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how we can make this transaction mutually beneficial.", "product_price": 950000}
